site.description: This site provides access to official releases of the Service-Technology.org Editor Application "Seda".

category-def.name: seda
category-def.label: Service-Technology.org Editor Application
category-def.description: The core of the Service-Technology.org Editor Application.

category-def.name: seda_tech_runtime
category-def.label: Additional Seda Runtime Files
category-def.description: Additional packages and programs that are required by Seda. Most of these packages can also be obtained from their original contributors. They are provided here for convenience and to ensure compatibility with the current release. Some original packages have been extended or modified to ensure compatibility.
